details.title: Terahertz Pioneers: Manfred Winnewisser and Brenda Pruden Winnewisser: "Equating Hamiltonians to nature"
details.abstract: A brief biography of Manfred Winnewisser and Brenda Pruden Winnewisser is given highlighting their careers and professional achievements.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
